edits.original_text: told him not to be uneasy on her behalf for she was quite well
edits.corrected_text: told him not to be uneasy on her behalf, for she was quite well

edits.original_text: On his opening the door Mr. Meagles stopped, faced round, and said
edits.corrected_text: On his opening the door, Mr. Meagles stopped, faced round, and said

edits.original_text: Mr. Meagles in an excited state walking up and down his room
edits.corrected_text: Mr. Meagles, in an excited state, walking up and down his room
